results.title: Physiotherapy
results.creator_credit: Mutual Film Corporation and Career Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Is this your career series”.
A vocational guidance film showing how physiotherapists assist patients to recover the use of limbs after injuries, etc. Demonstrates various techniques used and shows training briefly.
results.description:

results.title: Tales of gods and demons
results.brief_description:
Episode number 6 of Series “Journey into Thailand”.
Describes the history of the masked ballet performed by Thai dancers. Explains the dance drama Ramakein and the myths and legends from which it originates.
results.description:
Episode number 6 of Series “Journey into Thailand”.

results.title: Food technology
results.creator_credit: Mutual Film Corporation and Career Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Is this your career series”.
A vocational guidance film showing scientists involved in food preparation and storage, and research into development of new processes and packaging methods. Discusses opportunities for the food technologist.

results.title: Strength of the land
results.creator_credit: Geoffrey Barnes, Alan Bateman and ABC-TV (Australia)
results.brief_description:
Episode number 2 of Series “Journey into Thailand”.
This video follows the King of Thailand, Bhumibol Adulyadej, through his many personal and public activities, including his interest in science, agricultural engineering, the arts, and his tours of his country. Narrated by Keith Adam.
results.description:
Episode number 2 of Series “Journey into Thailand”.
This video follows the King of Thailand, Bhumibol Adulyadej, through his many personal and public activities, including his interest in science, agricultural engineering, the arts, and his tours of his country. Narrated by Keith Adam.
description_for_label:
Episode number 2 of Series “Journey into Thailand”.

results.creator_credit: Mutual Film Corporation and Career Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Is this your career series”.
A vocational guidance film showing the pharmacist at work in the preparation of preventative and curative medicines. Discusses careers in the corner pharmacy, in a large pharmaceutical company or in a hospital.

results.title: The Other Thailand
results.creator_credit: Geoffrey Barnes, Alan Bateman and ABC-TV (Australia)
results.brief_description:
Episode number 1 of Series “Journey into Thailand”.
This program, presented by Keith Adam, describes the southern area of Thailand where the majority of the people are Muslim. It explores the industries in the area and the conflicts with the northern Buddhist population.
results.description:
Episode number 1 of Series “Journey into Thailand”.
This program, presented by Keith Adam, describes the southern area of Thailand where the majority of the people are Muslim. It explores the industries in the area and the conflicts with the northern Buddhist population.

results.title: Journey into Thailand
results.brief_description: Travel with Keith Adam as he examines the life and culture of Thailand. Each episode reveals an aspect of this ancient land, its people and history.
results.description: Travel with Keith Adam as he examines the life and culture of Thailand. Each episode reveals an aspect of this ancient land, its people and history.

results.title: Litho or gravure printing
results.creator_credit: Mutual Film Corporation and Career Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Is this your career series”.
Shows how the basic principles of printing may be applied differently by the lithographic and rotagravure techniques. Shows use of photography in the preparation of litho plates and gravure cylinders. Includes application of these methods to automatic silk screen printing.
results.description:
Episode of Series “Is this your career series”.
Shows how the basic principles of printing may be applied differently by the lithographic and rotagravure techniques. Shows use of photography in the preparation of litho plates and gravure cylinders. Includes application of these methods to automatic silk screen printing.
description_for_label:

results.title: Responsible jobs for girls
results.creator_credit: Mutual Life and Citizens' Assurance Co. and Career Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Is this your career series”.
A vocational guidance film showing the wide range of opportunities for girls with high school and higher education in administrative and information fields.
